## Task-Based Informatics Professional Services

### Announcement Details

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01004370
* **Solicitation Number:** 84084-21-0102R
* **Publication Date:** 2022-08-15
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2022-09-13T16:00:00 (now expired)

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement, and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement.

### Requirement

The Canadian Energy Regulator requires informatics professional services to supplement CER staff in providing Application/Software Architect and Cloud Architect services to meet its business and technical requirements. The services must be provided on an "as-and-when-requested" basis through an approved Task Authorization.

### Additional Information

The tender description and requirements can be found in the following attachments:

* English: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/15/c25c71f17543cc7ebd6c1b35ac9dea03/npp_84084-21-0102r_eng.pdf>
* French: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/15/389bbce074ad7e9057cdaf3cc9eaac84/npp_84084-21-0102r_fr.pdf>

### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Karen-Anne Deslandes at Karen-Anne.Deslandes@cer-rec.gc.ca.
